title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing java file. 
2) Make some modifications to the file (e.g. move an existing class).
3) Click the SaveAs icon, which is located next to the Save Icon.
4) A dialog box will appear. Browse for a valid container location.
5) Type the filename in the dialog box, but do not include the file extension, as it is not requested.
6) Click OK.

Observed Behavior: The file is added to the specified location in the Navigator, but no file extension is shown for the file.
